Testing VPMULLD instruction
==========================
Test 1: 128-bit basic functionality
Operand A: 100000 -200000 300000 -400000 
Operand B: -150000 250000 -350000 450000 
Result: -2115098112 1539607552 -1920784896 388626432 
Expected: -2115098112 1539607552 -1920784896 388626432 
[PASS]

Test 2: 128-bit boundary values
Operand A: 2147483647 -2147483648 2147483647 -2147483648 
Operand B: -2147483648 2147483647 2147483647 -2147483648 
Result: -2147483648 -2147483648 1 0 
Expected: -2147483648 -2147483648 1 0 
[PASS]

Test 3: 128-bit memory operand
Operand A (register): 500000 -600000 700000 -800000 
Operand B (memory): -400000 650000 -750000 850000 
Result: 1863462912 842023936 -1013989888 -1395167232 
Expected: 1863462912 842023936 -1013989888 -1395167232 
[PASS]

Test 4: 256-bit AVX operation
Operand A: 100000 -200000 300000 -400000 500000 -600000 700000 -800000 
Operand B: -150000 250000 -350000 450000 -550000 650000 -750000 850000 
Result: -2115098112 1539607552 -1920784896 388626432 -122093056 842023936 -1013989888 -1395167232 
Expected: -2115098112 1539607552 -1920784896 388626432 -122093056 842023936 -1013989888 -1395167232 
[PASS]

VPMULLD tests PASSED
